Privacy Notice

How we share information

We do not sell, rent, exchange or allow your data to be used by third parties for their own marketing purposes.

data_type: information we hold on you in electronic format
text: You can ask us to supply you with the information that we hold on you in an electronic format.

data_type: personal data enter into saas product
text: OnceHub processes two broad categories of personal data: Personal data that is entered into our SaaS products by our customers and their end users (" Application Data ") for which we act as a processor.

OnceHub processes two broad categories of personal data: Personal data of our customers, account holders, and visitors to our web site as well as technical data regarding our customers interaction with our services (" Customer Data "), for which we act as a controller; and

How we process Customer Data

Purposes for which we use the information : To help us improve our services and provide training to our team members.
